bibl.title: Rape and the Politics of Consent in Classical Athens. (Cambridge Classical Studies.)
bibl.note: See in part. Part II, pp. 137-229: Menander: Propriety and Transgression (Introduction: Menander in context; - 5. Rape and recognition in Menander; - 6. Rape and maintaining the status quo: citizenship, marriage, money and eros).
bibl.seg: OMITOWOJU Rosanna, Rape and the Politics of Consent in Classical Athens. (Cambridge Classical Studies.)
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2002, 8°, ix-249 pp. ISBN 0-521-80074-9. £45.

See in part. Part II, pp. 137-229: Menander: Propriety and Transgression (Introduction: Menander in context; - 5. Rape and recognition in Menander; - 6. Rape and maintaining the status quo: citizenship, marriage, money and eros).
C.R. par Nancy Worman, AJP 124 (2003) pp. 617-620. - Nick Fisher, CR N.S., 55 (2005) pp. 582-584. - Allison Glazebrook, Phoenix 58 (2004) pp. 153-157.
